alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:53AM CDT until June 12 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 452 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Elk City to 5 miles southwest of Retrop, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Sayre, Hobart, Cordell, Granite, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Arapaho, Dill City, Canute, Lone Wolf, Butler, Carter, Gotebo, Bessie, Rocky, Foss, Willow, and Retrop. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita
